'''''Sonic blast''''' was a simple spell used by [[sorcerer]]s and [[wizard]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell blasted a target with deafening, high-pitched noise. If a targeted individual lacked defenses against the spell, they risked temporary deafness. The spell was useless if cast in the area of effect of a ''[[silence]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: This spell only required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
